title: Scanning PL on MoTe2 1+2 Heterostructure A2
description: Scanning photoluminescence (PL) study of a MoTe2 1+2 (monolayer/bilayer) heterostructure, sample A2. The experiment explores the gate-dependent PL response using a dual-gate configuration, revealing sharp transitions and hysteresis in the PL intensity. The data is analyzed as a function of carrier density (n) and displacement field (D), with features suggestive of correlated states at integer fillings.
